channel.title: INfinance

item.title: I’m 80. Is this a good or bad time to dip into my $650K retirement fund to remodel my bathroom?
item.description: “The economic and political climate makes me reluctant to do so.”

item.title: Why the S&P 500’s path to 7,000 is alive and well, according to trader who nailed summer call for stocks to climb

item.title: ETFs that protect against ‘painful’ stock-market drops are attracting worried investors
item.description: Investors seeking to manage risk in their portfolios are turning to ETFs that buffer against losses in the stock market.

item.title: I’m 44. I have $400K in cash. I’m worried about a stock-market crash. Do I dare invest?
item.description: “My rental properties generate passive income of $6,000 monthly after taxes.”

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
